title: Run late build of WSL on older build of Win10
body:
I need to run a stable, released build of Win10 to do my daily work (eg. 14393/1607), but also want to use newer features of WSL, eg. running Windows exe's from bash.
Is there a way to run both in the same Windows system (without virtualization with host/guest), eg. by replacing some dll's or other system files with newer ones?
That would be great!

comments.body: Windows compatibility system does not work like that.
